title: Cold chicken curry salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '8 skinless chicken breast fillets', '3 onions, finely chopped', '2 carrots, finely sliced', '2 tablespoons vindaloo curry paste', '4 tablespoons water', '3 dessertspoons peanut butter', '3 dessertspoons chilli sauce', '1 tablespoon chopped root ginger', '3 tablespoons coconut cream', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh tarragon', '300ml soured cream']
